data.approach: Build Svelte component for managing agent programs. Will include: 1) List view with agent cards showing status, 2) Edit drawer for full configuration, 3) Add Agent with preset templates, 4) Drag-to-reorder functionality. Following patterns from CredentialsEditor.svelte and using existing agentConfig utilities and API endpoints.

data.summary: Built full Svelte 5 component for managing agent programs with list view, edit drawer, add modal with presets, drag-to-reorder, and all CRUD operations
data.changesDescription: Created AgentProgramsEditor.svelte (1169 lines) with: programs list with status badges and enable toggles, edit drawer with models/flags management, add modal with preset templates (Claude/Codex/Gemini/Aider), drag-to-reorder functionality, set default agent, delete confirmation

summary: Implemented programs list with status badges, enable toggles, and drag-to-reorder
Built edit drawer with models management, CLI flags input, and auth configuration
Added preset templates modal for Claude Code, Codex CLI, Gemini Code, and Aider
Integrated with existing API endpoints for full CRUD operations
Created AgentProgramsEditor Svelte component with list view of configured agents
Implemented configuration drawer with detailed agent program settings
Added support for default agent selection and reordering functionality
Created UI for adding new agents with preset templates

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Unit Tests for AgentProgramsEditor Component
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the AgentProgramsEditor component to validate its core functionality. Tests should cover agent configuration, template selection, enable/disable toggling, and drag-to-reorder interactions. Use Svelte Testing Library and cover edge cases in agent configuration and state management.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure component reliability and prevent regressions

suggestedTasks.title: Create Documentation for Agent Program Configuration
suggestedTasks.description: Develop detailed documentation explaining the agent program configuration process, including available settings, template usage, and configuration best practices. Include screenshots and example configurations to help developers understand the component's capabilities.

gotchas: Ensure proper handling of API key references
